item.title: Help with pickup
item.dc:creator: @xparty-hatszx xparty-hatszx
item.description:
@xparty-hatszx wrote:

help with pickup?

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) &&

(playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID =

Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount =

Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (newItemID == ITEMID){
sM(“You can’t spawn this item.”);
} else if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“That Item Doesn’t Exist”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
}
}[/code]

and compile

client.java:10639: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ITEMID location: class client if (newItemID == ITEMID) { ^ Note: EconomyBoost.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
